definition: occurring by turns, someone who takes the place of another person, to do something in turns
details:
adjective
- occurring by turns
= synonyms: alternating
- every second one of a series
- of leaves and branches etc
- serving or used in place of another
= synonyms: alternative
noun
- someone who takes the place of another person
= synonyms: replacement
verb
- to do something in turns
= example: to do something in turns
= synonyms: take turns
- to go back and forth
= example: to go back and forth
= synonyms: jump
- to be an understudy or alternate for a role
= example: to be an understudy or alternate for a role
= synonyms: understudy
